title: How to know the real number of a faked WhatsApp phone number - Quora

response.answer_text: The phone number you see on WhatsApp is the actual number that was used to set up that account. Before that person texted you on WhatsApp, he or she had to: Have access to that phone numberComplete a verification code processTherefore, the person actually owned the number at one point of time. Keep in mind that WhatsApp can still be accessible after he no longer owns the number. Today is easy to get new phone numbers using apps like Phoner to create multiple WhatsApp accounts.

Originally no one can create a fake WhatsApp number as it need to receive an SMS where a number is assigned. But the user can continue using that number in WhatsApp even after discontinuing that number. But when that number is assigned to another user and he decides to use WhatsApp, the previous guy's WhatsApp will fail to operate.
